channel.title: NEW HALF-LIFE Live Action short film upcoming !
channel.description:
[url='https://youtu.be/ALYRvfA4Gz0']https://youtu.be/ALYRvfA4Gz0[/url] [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/386270_430105727025327_1529081506_n.jpg[/img]
sorry for the spam I would like to know what you guys, huge half-life fans, are thinking of my project ?

item.title: NEW HALF-LIFE Live Action short film upcoming !
item.dc:creator: raiseer
item.description:
Wow, really looks awesome. Though I have two “complaints”, or rather “constructive feedback”:
First: Yeah, the female scientist shooting the headcrabs does look silly. I know you already responded to that, just wanted to say that I thought so, too, while watching the clip.
Second: Same goes with the first person perspective. It was funny in the Doom movie, but (based on the trailer) I guess this series is supposed to be serious. The FPS perspective is a fine gag, but undermines any seriousness (IMO).
Other than that, it looks REALLY good. The creatures are very well done, so is all the rest of the props and background. I immediately subscribed to your channel to not miss your future endeavours.

Off-Topic question: Have you seen the two “Escape From City 17” clips by the “PurchaseBrothers”? (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1UPMEmCqZo) I bet you’ll love it. Especially the effects are easily Hollywood quality.
Also quite good: Beyond Black Mesa (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOrH5tfWorg)
Not comparable to EFC17, but still very well done. Also the girl in here is even cuter than the one in EFC17 (IMO)

Read full topic

Arvuti:

Looks good but that scene with the scientist chick shooting the headcrabs should be cut, looks way too silly.

yes you are right I think I will not keep it (even if now, there is screaming female scientist in Black MEsa source )
